titleStmt.title: Melius inquirendum: or A further modest and impartial enquiry into the lawfulness of taking the new oath of allegeance. By a divine of the Church of England
titleStmt.author: Divine of the Church of England.
Melish, Stephen, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jonathan Robinson; and are to be sold by Clement Elis bookseller in Mansfield in Nottinghamshire,

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes authorship to Stephen Melish.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
